text: 22.44: Zo 12.27; Hi 5.7Zisas wo khɨkhɨm mbararagim, ana guigira simgim, ana thav khaŋ tɨgap Fhe Bakɨme phorga nzuai. Ana khaŋ tɨgap Fhe Bakɨme phorga nzuaim, ana zorɨk vɨzɨna fara muuŋgiap sia mbu nuiana sui. 22.44 Bigi kaŋgi gumgi mbari kha ndɨkndɨga mbui. Mba kama phuni kɨtɨgar ki kameŋ ne Ruk nduara ne khergi fhuvara. Harigi guma mbe zumgum mba kameŋ khergi.
